Parma are the only side that's yet to win in 2025, apart from Empoli, as they hit the post twice in their previous match against Cagliari, which they lost 2-1. At the other end, Roma are coming off a...

arts.ttl: Parma vs. Roma: a big game in both the relegation and European battle
arts.sum: Parma have won their last two home league games against Roma (both without conceding a goal via 2-0); only once have the Emilians achieved more home wins in a row against the Giallorossi (three at the Tardini stadium in the first three matches at this stadium between 1990 and 1993). Roma kept a clean sheet in their most recent league match against Venezia and could register two clean sheets in a row for the first time in Serie A this season; the last time they haven’t conceded goal in two games in a row was back in the period between March and April 2024 (three in that case).

arts.ttl: Roma Breath Sigh of Relief After Dybala Injures Knee
arts.sum: Paulo Dybala left the first leg of the Europa League playoff versus Porto late in the first half after banging knees with an opponent. La Joya took some tests on Friday, which revealed a simple bruise with some swelling and no structural damage. The post Roma Breath Sigh of Relief After Dybala Injures Knee appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
